main event: A UFO was sighted in Brookfield, Ohio on 15 August 1958. The object was described as a white oval, flashing, and moving in an irregular course before shooting upwards and fading away.
interesting points: The UFO was observed for 1-2 minutes before disappearing suddenly.
Witness reported the object traveling at high speeds and fading to the southeast.
The sighting occurred at 8:54 P.M. EST.
Contacts and organizations related to the sighting include CCMDR 622D ACWRCN BROOKFIELD AFS OHIO, RJEDN/CCMDR ADC, and others.
First Lt. Howard H. Kelly, the Intelligence Officer, believed the object to be part of a satellite (rocket) circling.
